info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 1:33AM MST until September 19 at 4:30AM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Washington Fire scar in... Gila County in east central Arizona...
* Until 430 AM MST.
* At 133 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Washington Fire scar. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Washington Fire scar.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Washington Fire scar.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Washington Park and Whispering Pines.
This includes the following recreation areas and campgrounds... Shadow Rim Ranch.
info.instruction: This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the Washington Fire scar. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:30 AM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 4:30 AM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 1:33AM MST until September 19 at 4:30AM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ

Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:30 AM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:30 AM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
